messages.subject: Users of KaZaA and Other File Sharing Programs
messages.msgSnippet: Should probably check out these links. http://and.doxdesk.com/parasite/BDE.html http://news.com.com/2100-1023-873181.html
messages.messageBody:
Should probably check out these links.
http://and.doxdesk.com/parasite/BDE.html
http://news.com.com/2100-1023-873181.html
http://news.com.com/2100-1023-875274.html
http://news.zdnet.co.uk/story/0,,t269-s2107708,00.html

And other internet users might want to read this about pop up downloads.
http://news.com.com/2100-1023-877568.html
You really need to read carefully when you're online these days. How many
of us glaze over when reading user agreements for things they
download? Better stop glazing and start reading. They're slipping a lot
of stuff in there these days.
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
